search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Databox (databox.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Databox can be found at: [https://databox.com/pricing](https://databox.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:

### Create a Free Account and:

*   Test unlimited plan for 15 days
*   Connect your favorite platforms
*   Manage all clients in one place
*   Create beautiful sharable dashboards
*   Create reports with the help of AI
*   And more!

[Try It, Free](https://databox.com/signup)

![Image 5: Davorin Gabrovec & Peter Caputa, our Founder and CEO](https://databox.com/wp-content/themes/databox/inc/img/templates/popup-cta/no-credit-card.svg) 100% Free. No credit card required.

**Simple to start, built to scale**
===================================

Everyone starts with a 14-day trial of the Growth plan. Then choose the plan that best suits your needs.

*   Priority support and one-on-one guidance Get your cases escalated to the top of the queues while also being connected with a data expert who can provide consultative support to improve your use of data.
    
*   Enterprise-level security & legal compliance Further secure your data with single sign-on, forced 2FA, and more.

Connect Data

Data Sources included A Data Source is any property, account, or other source of data you want to integrate. (e.g., Syncing 3 GA4 properties would count as 3 data sources).

Data Source limit Add additional Data Sources to sync all of your data with Databox.

Sync frequency Update the sync frequency of your Data Sources.

120+ native integrations Connect HubSpot, Google Analytics, Facebook Ads, and more using a pre-built, one-click integration.

3rd party integrations (Zapier, Make) Visualize performance from 2,000+ third-party integrations using Zapier and Make.

Push custom data to API Push pre-processed data to Databox using scripting languages via the Rest API.

Spreadsheet integrations (Excel, Google Sheets) Use Databox to visualize your Google Sheets and Excel data.

Dataset integrations

SQL integrations Visualize your data from PostgreSQL, MySQL, AWS Redshift, Microsoft SQL Azure, Microsoft SQL Service, Google BigQuery and Snowflake in Databox.

Store Data

Historical data The maximum amount of historical data that’s available in your Databox Account.

Warehouse data storage The maximum amount of data that will be stored by Databox.

Prepare Your Data For Analysis\* Available for select integrations. Visit the [Available Integrations](https://app.databox.com/data-manager/available#all|dataset|Popularity) page in-app for details.

Create datasets Select the view and columns of data you need to create your custom dataset.

Filter dataset data Easily filter specific rows of data when preparing your dataset.

Merge datasets

soon

Combine data from different Data Sources (i.e., HubSpot and Stripe) using a unique identifier (like an email address or customer ID) to calculate new metrics and perform more advanced analysis.

Calculate dataset data

soon

Perform calculations on raw data, whether from one table or combined datasets.

Export dataset to CSV Export your dataset tables as CSV files for further analysis and sharing.

Build Custom Dashboards

Databoards Databoards are Databox dashboards.

300+ Public Databoard Templates Instantly visualize your performance using one of over 300 pre-built dashboard Templates created by our community of experts.

Dashboard Designer Visualize KPIs in a variety of ways, and build meaningful dashboards–no code or design skills necessary.

Databoard Account Templates Create and use custom dashboard templates in your Account to streamline your reporting process.

Databoard Loops Loop multiple dashboards together to create a comprehensive presentation of performance data.

Metric Builder Use Metric Builder to create Custom Metrics and get a more granular view of your performance.

Custom Metrics Build Custom Metrics to monitor custom data, events, goals and more with just a few clicks.

Data Calculations Easily calculate (add, subtract, multiply, divide) new metrics from any Data Source using Data Calculations.

Custom date ranges Define your own Date Ranges and Comparison Periods by selecting the start and end dates, custom rolling periods, and more.

Removable branding on Databoards Remove “Powered by Databox” and the Databox logo from dashboards in your Account.

Media creatives Display your ad creatives alongside related ads data.

Instant refresh A button to instantly refresh your data on demand 1x per day.

Fiscal Calendars Monitor, visualize, and report on all of your business data based on your fiscal calendar.

Monitor Performance Everywhere

Personalized Performance screen Keep an eye on what matters most, from critical KPIs to emerging trends.

Metrics screen Monitor all of your key metrics from one screen to see how performance is trending at a glance.

Slack integration Get dashboards, alerts, scorecards, and more delivered directly to Slack.

Stream to TV Easily stream your Databoards to any Smart TV using your own unique streaming code.

Mobile app access Monitor your performance data anytime, anywhere using the Databox Mobile app (available for iOS and Android).

Set and Track Goals

Create manual goals Set and track goals by manually entering a specific value (number, percentage, or currency). Then, update progress as needed by entering new values.

Add goals to dashboards Monitor your goal progress using gauge charts, progress bars, tables, and more.

Create metric-based goals Set goals based on your key metrics and track progress automatically as your data updates.

Advanced goal setup Set and adjust goals for all periods automatically. Or, update any period individually and instantly recalculate the rest with a single click.

View forecast and benchmark data See forecasted values and benchmark data while setting goals.

Teams & Collaboration

Create team spaces

new

Create dedicated spaces for each team in your organization and add the metrics, goals, dashboards, and reports they need to track.

Team permissions & sharing

soon

Easily Share With Your Team

Shareable Databoard Links A unique URL used for sharing and viewing your dashboards outside of the Databox app.

Scheduled Databoard Snapshots Schedule regular exports of dashboards to be delivered via email as JPGs or a PDF.

Scorecards Receive regular Scorecard updates on your most important KPIs through email, mobile push notification, and/or Slack.

Weekly Digest Receive detailed metric performance updates directly in your inbox each week.

Embed Databoards Use the simple embed code to share and publish live dashboards on any web page.

Annotations Add additional context and insights as a comment directly on a data point in a visualization.

Alerts Automatically and proactively monitor your most important KPIs and stay up-to-date on performance trends using Alerts.

Reporting

Create flexible reports

new

Create flexible, beautiful reports in presentation or page formats.

Presentation mode

new

Schedule Reports Schedule Reports to be sent on a daily, weekly, monthly, or quarterly basis. Add an automated reminder to be delivered to your inbox ahead of the scheduled send.

Use pre-built templates Instantly create Reports using pre-built Report Templates created by our community of experts.

Save custom templates Create and use custom Report Templates in your Account to streamline your reporting process.

Share and download PDFs Download Report PDFs directly in Databox or send via email.

Archive Reports Access, view, and retrieve all of your Account's Report PDFs.

Remove branding Remove “Powered by Databox” and the Databox logo from Reports in your Account.

Add data stories Add dynamic elements like metrics, time periods, and percentage of change to the text of your reports.

Add AI Performance Summaries

new

Summarize your performance with AI.

Data and AI features

Metric Forecasts

new

Predict future performace for your KPIs, optimize your strategy, and stay ahead of your competition.

Performance summaries

new

Artificial intelligence will assist you in discovering connections, patterns, and emerging trends in your data.

Anomaly Detection

new

Identify unusual patterns or outliers in data, which may indicate potential anomalies or areas of opportunity.

Smart alerts

new

Get notified when unusual behavior (like an unexpected spike or dip) is automatically detected in your data.

Advanced Benchmarks

new

Instantly compare your performance against other similar companies to recognize areas of opportunity and sell/ upsell/ retain clients.

Metric Correlations

soon

Quickly identify relationships between metrics to understand how they impact one another and how you can influence your overall performance.

Partner only features

Client Accounts Use Client Accounts to create a secure, repeatable, organized, and valuable reporting process for both your Agency and Clients.

Client Performance & Goals Overview View every client’s top KPIs and goals in one screen. Eliminate the work required for internal review of client performance and goal achievement.

White-labeling Create an on-brand experience in your Databox Account. Allow users to login, view dashboards, and receive emails with your company's branding. Perfect if you plan to resell Databox to your clients.

Support and consulting

Chat & Email Support

Priority Support Move your cases to the top of our chat and email support queues.

Guided Onboarding (6h) Personalized guidance as you set up and roll out Databox to your company. Includes 6 calls of one-on-one or team support, as well as priority support for 3 months.

Dedicated Analyst (2h/mo) Meet with a Databox expert and business analyst twice a month to discuss your goals, develop a plan for success, and assist with the creation of dashboards and reports.

Account management & security

Users Users can log in to your Databox Account and view or edit different features according to their user role and permissions.

User management Add and manage permissions for your team and clients in Databox.

Two-factor authentication (2FA) Add an additional layer of security to your account by requiring more than just a password to log in.

Single sign-on (SSO) We support Single Sign-on (SSO) over SAML 2.0 open authentication standard.

Advanced Security Management Make your account more secure and protect sensitive data, meet internal company policies, build trust and confidence and enhance control over your data by using Force 2FA, Force SSO, Activity Log, Login Records and Active User Sessions.

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

How do you protect privacy and ensure security?

We take data security very seriously. Amazon is our hosting partner, and our servers are hosted in a world-class data center with the most advanced [security](https://databox.com/security-policy) protocols. Read more about how we protect and ensure the [privacy of your data](https://databox.com/security-policy).

Can I upgrade and downgrade at any time?

Absolutely. Our flexible payment plans allow you to upgrade, downgrade, or cancel at any time. When upgrading, you’re only responsible for the difference in cost between your current plan and your new plan. When downgrading, your plan changes immediately and you’ll receive a credit applied to future payments covering the difference in cost between the current plan and the new plan. Cancellations take effect at the end of your billing period.

Do you offer a yearly discount?

Yes. Upgrade to a yearly subscription and get 20% off.

Which payment methods do you accept?

You can pay for your subscription using Visa, Mastercard, Maestro, American Express, JCB, Discover, Diners Club, Union Pay, and Google Pay. Annual subscriptions can be billed with other payment methods (wire bank transfer, checks,...). Contact us for more information.

What happens after my free trial?

During the 14-day trial, you can purchase a paid plan and your first payment will be at the end of the trial period. If you do not purchase, the trial will simply expire and you’ll be prompted to continue on the Free Plan. We do not require a credit card to start a trial.

What if I exceed my plan's limits?

No problem, we will automatically notify you within the app when you run into a limit for your plan. Common limits you get notified of are the number of users, dashboards, data sources, custom metrics, and when trying to use certain advanced features not included in your Plan.

How can I cancel my subscription?

You can cancel your subscription at any time from the bottom section on the Plans or Billing page. Our support team can help if you just need to pause your account temporarily.

What support resources are available to me?

World-class support is included in all plans! Everyone gets access to:

*   Our Support Team - just start a chat with us
*   [Help Center](https://help.databox.com/).

What currency is used for billing?

All prices listed are shown in US dollars (USD).

What is the difference between a Data source and a Connection?

A Connection refers to the integration you set up to bring in data from a specific service or tool, such as Google Analytics.

A Data source is a specific dataset or view within that Connection. For instance, in Google Analytics, a Data source would be a particular website property like a specific website's domain.

One Connection can encompass multiple Data sources. So, while you have a single connection to Google Analytics, you can access and use data from multiple properties (domains) within that Connection.
